Rulings.HAT:
● Like all "when...you can" effects, this effect can have incorrect activation timing.

● Summoning a monster is optional. You can activate this effect even if you can't Special Summon.
● Since this is a "then" effect, Summoning a monster happens after the card is destroyed (and can only happen if the card is destroyed). 
You can read more about conjunctions here: [link being updated]post/conjunctions
● You can Solemn Warning this effect.
